page-general-notReadyYet: This section is not ready yet!
page-general-comeBackLater: Come back on the next update and it may be ready ^^
page-home-description: The unofficial Vintage Story Launcher with all the features you need.
page-versions-noVersionsFoundSub: Install a new one with the "plus" or add an already installed one with the "magnifying glass" button at the bottom of this page
component-installationsMenu-noInstallati: Create a new one with the "plus" button
component-mainMenu-gameRunningDesc: The game is running in the background, please, close it to use VS Launcher
component-mainMenu-gameRunningSubDesc: You cant use VS Launcher while playing to prevent any conflicts with the game!
component-searchForAVersionMenu-info: Make sure the detected version is the one you've selected and if it's not edit it on the above field making sure it follows the convetion X.X.X and if it's rc or pre X.X.X-rc.X or X.X.X-pre.X.
component-uninstallVersionMenu-areYouSur: Are you sure you want to uninstall this version?
component-addInstallationMenu-noVersions: First you've to install or add a game version to VS Launcher here:
component-addInstallationMenu-folderInUs: Be careful, this folder is in use by another installation!
component-addInstallationMenu-recomended: Its recomended to use a clean folder for each installation but if you already had the game installed you can select the same folder you was using before and it'll use those worlds, mods and so on.
component-deleteInstallationMenu-areYouS: Are you sure you want to delete this installation?
component-deleteInstallationMenu-ifDontD: If you dont delete data you will be able to access it here:
notification-body-errorExecutingGame: An error ocurred while executing game
notification-body-versionErrorLookingFor: No game version was found on that folder
notification-body-versionAlreadyInstalle: The version {{version}} of the game is already installed on VS Launcher
notification-body-versionSuccesfullyFoun: Game version {{version}} was found and added successfully
notification-body-versionNotFound: No game version was found on that folder
notification-body-versionErrorInstalling: An error ocurred while installing game version {{version}}
notification-body-versionErrorUninstalli: An error ocurred while uninstalling game version {{version}}
notification-body-installationErrorAddin: An error ocurred while adding installation {{installation}}
notification-body-installationErrorDelet: An error ocurred while deleting installation {{installation}}
notification-body-installationErrorEditi: An error ocurred while editing installation {{installation}}
notification-body-noVersionSelectedToUni: Please, select a version to uninstall
notification-body-noInstallationSelected: Please, select an installation to delete
Please, select an installation to edit
Please, select an installation to open on the file explorer
notification-body-folderDoesntExists: This can happen if you have never opened the game with this installation. Open and close the game to create the necessary folders and files and try again.
notification-body-updateAvailable: A new update is available! Downloading on the background...
notification-body-updateDownloaded: Update downloaded succesfully! Close VS Launcher and wait 1 minute for it tu update.
